Uses of Class
edu.rit.p3.data.exception.BeerServiceClosedException

  • Packages that use BeerServiceClosedException 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.p3  
    edu.rit.p3.web  

    • Uses of BeerServiceClosedException in edu.rit.p3

      Methods in edu.rit.p3 that throw BeerServiceClosedException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] BeerService.getBeers(String token)
      Takes a string denoting a token and returns a list of the known beers if the token is valid.
      String BeerService.getCheapest(String token)
      Takes a string denoting a token and returns the name of the least expensive beer if the token is valid.
      String BeerService.getCostliest(String token)
      Takes a string denoting a token and returns the name of the most expensive beer if the token is valid.
      double BeerService.getPrice(String beerName, String token)
      Takes a string denoting the beer brand and a string denoting a token and returns a double representing the beer price if the token is valid.
      boolean BeerService.setPrice(String beerName, double price, String token)
      Takes a string denoting the beer brand, a double denoting the price and a string denoting a token returns true or false depending on success and if the token is valid.

    • Uses of BeerServiceClosedException in edu.rit.p3.web

      Methods in edu.rit.p3.web that throw BeerServiceClosedException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Beer> BeerController.getBeers(String token)
      Takes no arguments and returns a list of the known beers.
      Beer BeerController.getCheapest(String token)
      Takes no arguments and returns the least expensive beer.
      Beer BeerController.getCostliest(String token)
      Takes no arguments and returns the the most expensive beer.
      double BeerController.getPrice(String beerName, String token)
      Takes a string denoting the beer brand and returns a double representing the beer price.
      boolean BeerController.setPrice(String beerName, double price, String token)
      Takes a string denoting the beer brand and a double denoting the price returns true or false depending on success.
      private void BeerController.verifyToken(String tokenHash)
      This method is called locally within an instance of the BeerController in methods that perform operations that require authentication.
